description:
In this module students will write (and rewrite!) two fulllength plays of no less than 60 minutes in length. These

will be critiqued intensively by their classmates and by the

instructor. Students are at liberty to pick their own topics

and genres. Specific historical or critical readings and

dramatic texts will be assigned based on individual

students interests (e.g. musical theatre, Theatre of the

Oppressed). This is a demanding creative writing module

requiring self-direction and artistic independence.
title: Advanced Playwriting
